about_the_game:
Step into the enchanting world of Knights of the Round Peg, where players embark on a musical journey alongside a brave knight through 75 captivating levels. Equipped with a lute and a quiver of musical notes, the knight bravely embarks on a journey, encountering peg-filled challenges along the way.

Players must strategically clear pegs at each level using a limited number of balls.



As players progress, they will have the opportunity to explore the beautifully hand-drawn map of the kingdom. Each level backdrop is filled with interactive elements to discover.

Features

  • Go on a music filled journey
  • 75 interactive hand-drawn levels
  • Addictive Peg-breaking gameplay

short_description: Journey through Knights of the Round Peg's magical world with a brave lute-playing knight as you overcome peg obstacles!
